label: Claim
comment: The SustainabilityClaim class represents specific claims regarding the sustainability of a product, providing details about the metrics, thresholds, and evidences supporting the claim.

datatypeProperties.comment: A refernce to evidence to support the benchmark value.
A benchmark value against which the claimed value can be assessed. THis could be a value specified by a standard or regulation or could be an industry benchmark.
A URI pointing to the evidence supporting the claim. SHOULD be a URL to a UNTP Digital COnformity Credential (DCC)

referencedBy.comment: An array of claim objects representing various product conformity claims about the product / batch.  These can be sustainability claims, circularity claims, or any other claim type within the conformity topic list.
